definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Came all these sexy sandals, sexy pumps, platform shoes " stripper."
sentences.chinese: 所有這些來到性感涼鞋，性感泵，汽提塔鬆糕鞋。

sentences.english: I love wearing platform shoes, some kind of clothing that people notice me in.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡穿鬆糕鞋，那種能讓別人注意到我的鞋子。
